Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many people today know the price of everything and the value of nothing

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: Know yourself. Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe that you have to be a cow to know what milk is

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody ever drowned in his own sweat

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: No one has the right to destroy another person's belief by demanding empirical evidence

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with talking too fast is you may say something you haven't thought of yet

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: Television has proved that people will look at anything rather than each other

Quote.Author: Ann Landers
Quote.QuoteValue: You need that guy like a giraffe needs strep throat

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: Teaching was the hardest work I had ever done, and it remains the hardest work I have done to date

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I just feel like I'm a very lucky person to have a new life outside of politics

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: People work for a living. They got families to raise. Their lives are tough

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always said that in politics, your enemies can't hurt you, but your friends will kill you

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a real soft spot in my heart for librarians and people who care about books

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't know that New York really is just made up of a group of very small neighborhoods

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an awfully good life

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: Well it's really hard to satisfy the right wing. I can tell you that

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought I knew Texas pretty well, but I had no notion of its size until I campaigned it

Quote.Author: Ann Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I travel all over the country making speeches for people I believe in

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning is a tunnel experience that makes us think more broadly

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I am lucky: I have fantastic doctors and a fantastic dentist

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Identity is an assemblage of constellations

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, real artists, we expose our flaws. We long for intimacy

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think as a kid I always liked to listen to people. I loved hearing stories

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies, as evidenced by a chorus of protesting and celebrating Americans, influence broader trends

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Making your life is ultimately an extraordinarily creative endeavor

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't talk a lot when I interview. My job is to get out of the way

Quote.Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Each person has a literature inside them

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: My family has had to become quite understanding about me not returning phone calls when I'm filming

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't usually drink caffeine so that when I need it, it actually does something

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care for physical activity. I'm not sporty. I'm not very coordinated

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: In my dreams, I have Keira Knightley's eyebrows

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the person who wouldn't send back my food even if I got steak when I'd ordered fish

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: An actor should always let humility outweigh ambition

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody pulls a prank like George Clooney

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I happen to be a huge 'Lord of the Rings' fan. I do an annual marathon of the extended editions

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big fan of '30 Rock,' which I think is the most genius show on television

Quote.Author: Anna Kendrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not big on lip color, but I like to have a little something

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever is happy will make others happy too

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite everything, I believe that people are really good at heart

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: No one has ever become poor by giving

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Who would ever think that so much went on in the soul of a young girl?

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains

Quote.Author: Anne Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in a crazy time

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I think relationships are work, but love is a gift

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole beauty of music is that it goes where your words won't let you

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Mellow doesn't always make for a good story, but it makes for a good life

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I've honestly been really lucky. My only jobs have been babysitting and acting

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the short-haired lifestyle

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to believe that love was finding someone who would lead you through the deep water

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm much happier talking with people than I am flirting with them

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a teenager, I would have tried anything that an actress I liked was doing to get thin

Quote.Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that Jersey Shore is awesome. I've gone to Cape May every summer of my life

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfectionism is the voice of the oppressor

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Jesus is divine love manifest on Earth, as it comes through the community of Christians

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: I've known for years that resentments don't hurt the person we resent, but they do hurt us

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing as sweet as a comeback, when you are down and out, about to lose, and out of time

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of absolute happiness is to be in bed on a rainy day, with my blankie, my cat, and my dog

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want something special. I want something beautifully plain

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can appropriate God, goodness, the Bible or Jesus. It just seems that way

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: I would seriously rather be in a long line at the DMV than eat with people I don't know

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a great time to be alive

Quote.Author: Anne Lamott
Quote.QuoteValue: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel we are all islands - in a common sea

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief can't be shared. Everyone carries it alone. His own burden in his own way

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeeded

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: One can never pay in gratitude; one can only pay 'in kind' somewhere else in life

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: The wave of the future is coming and there is no fighting it

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere

Quote.Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote.QuoteValue: Only in growth, reform, and change, paradoxically enough, is true security to be found

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: The only pain in pleasure is the pleasure of the pain

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: We're frightened of what makes us different

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: The world doesn't need any more mediocrity or hedged bets

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always looking, and I'm always asking questions

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish we had more visible Christian and Catholic leaders who talked about love

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: I broke with my religion in college

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: Invest in a feather duster - the possibilities are endless

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: To write something, you have to risk making a fool of yourself

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: When you make his sandwiches, put a sexy or loving note in his lunch box

Quote.Author: Anne Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to become saints. We have to become like Christ. Anything less is simply not enough

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to change; I'm very stubborn in this way. I am what I am

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the best aspects of health care reform is it starts to emphasize prevention

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: Data helps solve problems

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: April 25th is DNA Day. I know, you probably had no idea

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: The reality is that the only way change comes is when you lead by example

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: It is important to democratize personal genetics and make it more accessible

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: A solid foundation in genetics is increasingly important for everyone

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's a point to regulating, because there are snake oil companies

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend a lot of my spare time with my family. My sisters, parents, and in-laws all live nearby

Quote.Author: Anne Wojcicki
Quote.QuoteValue: All the kids from my nursery school are still in touch

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a muscular energy in sunlight corresponding to the spiritual energy of wind

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't test courage cautiously

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: Spend the afternoon. You can't take it with you

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: The surest sign of age is loneliness

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to learn, or remember, how to live

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: The dedicated life is worth living. You must give with your whole heart

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no shortage of good days. It is good lives that are hard to come by

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: Write as if you were dying

Quote.Author: Annie Dillard
Quote.QuoteValue: Write about winter in the summer

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: A thing that you see in my pictures is that I was not afraid to fall in love with these people

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more interested in being good than being famous

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel a responsibility to my backyard. I want it to be taken care of and protected

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned to create a palette, a vocabulary of ways to take pictures

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I fight to take a good photograph every single time

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: At my Rolling Stones' tour, the camera was a protection. I used it in a Zen way

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel very proud of the work from the '80s because it is very bright and colorful

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: No one ever thought Clint Eastwood was funny, but he was

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to sort of enhance reality. There is nothing stranger than truth

Quote.Author: Annie Leibovitz
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to watch something go on and be talking at the same time

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame for fame's sake is toxic - some people want that, with no boundaries. It's unhealthy

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two kinds of artists left: those who endorse Pepsi and those who simply won't

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think music is the most phenomenal platform for intellectual thought

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my daughters have a pretty healthy self-awareness but I can't speak on their behalf

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I will go out of my way to avoid the shopping crowds and the extreme consumerism - I hate all that

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to be individual, to step beyond gender

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot to be grateful for

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Scotland could take a stand in a wonderful way, ecologically and morally and ethically

Quote.Author: Annie Lennox
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always felt a little homeless. It's a strange thing

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: There are always two people in every picture: the photographer and the viewer

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: A true photograph need not be explained, nor can it be contained in words

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I do get to places just when God's ready to have somebody click the shutter

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't take a photograph, you make it

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Not everybody trusts paintings but people believe photographs

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Photography is more than a medium for factual communication of ideas. It is a creative art

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: It is horrifying that we have to fight our own government to save the environment

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no rules for good photographs, there are only good photographs

Quote.Author: Ansel Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: Barbecue may not be the road to world peace, but it's a start

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: What nicer thing can you do for somebody than make them breakfast?

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: If anything is good for pounding humility into you permanently, it's the restaurant business

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn a lot about someone when you share a meal together

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: Context and memory play powerful roles in all the truly great meals in one's life

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid to look like an idiot

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: Is there a sharper commentary on American culture and the world than The Simpsons?

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not looking to freak people out - eating rodents or bugs. I don't do that anymore

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: If you get an opportunity to work with David Simon, anybody with good taste would

Quote.Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't that great a chef, and I don't think I'm that great a writer

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short to deal with other people's insecurities

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm devious, cruel, cunning and addictive

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I am able to play monsters well. I understand monsters. I understand madmen

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in nepotism. I don't much like the idea of parents who interfere

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I never make conscious decisions

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was grounded, a very meat-and-potatoes man. He was a baker

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I love life because what more is there?

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of acting is not to act. Once you show them more, what you show them, in fact is bad acting

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: My life turned out to be beyond my greatest dreams

Quote.Author: Anthony Hopkins
Quote.QuoteValue: A conductor can't be too arrogant with an orchestra and try to impose himself too much

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: When solving problems, dig at the roots instead of just hacking at the leaves

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Become addicted to constant and never-ending self-improvement

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't reinvent the wheel, just realign it

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Have a strong mind and a soft heart

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time

Quote.Author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important things in life aren't things

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: What I've realized over the years is that I have some pretty good friends

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: What doesn't kill you only makes your book longer

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: I inherited my father's insatiable desire to meet all the beautiful girls in the world

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: My days are whatever I want them to be

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the idea of defying the convention of what it is to be in your 40s, or 50s, or 60s

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, I am stuck with one foot in the past and one foot in the present

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: Also, we're all actually different blood types and we have one represented by each guy in the band

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: In terms of having high hopes that the level of consciousness will get higher and higher, yeah

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm still figuring out how to be a little less selfish

Quote.Author: Anthony Kiedis
Quote.QuoteValue: The road is not a problem

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: My sweetheart is to me more than a coined hemisphere

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the greatest rogues are they who talk most of their honesty

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: Oxford is the most dangerous place to which a young man can be sent

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: I hold that gentleman to be the best-dressed whose dress no one observes

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is so unlike theory

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no royal road to learning; no short cut to the acquirement of any art

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no road to wealth so easy and respectable as that of matrimony

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: And though it is much to be a nobleman, it is more to be a gentleman

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: High rank and soft manners may not always belong to a true heart

Quote.Author: Anthony Trollope
Quote.QuoteValue: No man thinks there is much ado about nothing when the ado is about himself

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - When you give yourself, you receive more than you give

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - To be a man is, precisely, to be responsible

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed

Quote.Author: Antoine de Sain
Quote.QuoteValue: xupery - I know but one freedom, and that is the freedom of the mind

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: We shall find peace. We shall hear angels, we shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are afraid of loneliness, do not marry

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: We learn about life not from plusses alone, but from minuses as well

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: You must trust and believe in people or life becomes impossible

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is an aptitude of the spirit. It is, in fact, a talent: you must be born with it

Quote.Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is what he believes

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: The court makes an amazing amount of decisions that ought to be made by the people

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: A search is a search, even if it happens to disclose nothing but the bottom of a turntable

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Words have meaning. And their meaning doesn't change

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Why in the world would you have it interpreted by nine lawyers?

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: A journalistic purpose could be someone with a Xerox machine in a basement

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to be an honest originalist! I will take the bitter with the sweet!

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: A man who has made no enemies is probably not a very good man

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: If you condemn someone who has committed a crime to be tortured, that would be unconstitutional

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: A good, hard-hitting dissent keeps you honest

Quote.Author: Antonin Scalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an originalist and a textualist, not a nut

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything changes as you get older - your mind, your body, the way you view the world

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: Expectation is the mother of all frustration

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: I like going everywhere. And I love starting new things

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: The recycling in my house was imposed by my kids

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: I get caught up in my bubble of reading, writing, or music

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema has opened a world of possibilities up for me

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: The man who doesn't want anything is invincible

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been an optimistic guy, to tell you the truth

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: In my personal life, I am very contemplative

Quote.Author: Antonio Banderas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there is a guy that played more gay characters than I have done in my life

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every birthday is a gift. Every day is a gift

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: We all require and want respect, man or woman, black or white. It's our basic human right

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't say Aretha is making a comeback, because I've never been away!

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: My faith always has been and always will be important to me

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing to the realists; people who accept it like it is

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the hardest thing is losing weight. That's the hardest thing more than anything else

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big woman. I need big hair

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the lady next door when I'm not on stage

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: I always felt rock and roll was very, very wholesome music

Quote.Author: Aretha Franklin
Quote.QuoteValue: Falling out of love is like losing weight. It's a lot easier putting it on than taking it off

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't ever doubt yourselves or waste a second of your life. It's too short, and you're too special

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's so important for girls to love themselves and to treat their bodies respectfully

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is really driving my whole life

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing burns more calories than dancing in 5-inch heels... try it!

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I've dreamed about doing music since I was three or four years old

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I like very girly, retro inspired, feminine, floral things. I'm not very edgy

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I love nerdy, cute, quirky boys who don't take themselves too seriously

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty sure my house in Florida is haunted! He's a nice ghost though

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I jog up to the Hollywood sign every weekend. It's fun and what a view!

Quote.Author: Ariana Grande
Quote.QuoteValue: I did stand-up for my grandparents every day when I was, like, eight

Quote.Author: Ariel Sharon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a friend of Colin Powell. We talk quite often
